name: MIPL WP Users Forms
author: Mulika Team

sections.description:
Simple Login And Registration Forms, Users=>Login & Registration”.

Features

  • Create Registration Forms.
  • Custom Fields to Registration Forms.
  • Create Login Form.
  • Social Media Google Login.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugins folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Create Rregistration Form.
  4. Update the Users Forms settings.
  5. Setup the Google Login keys.
  6. Setup the Recaptcha keys.
  7. Add Login & Registration Form shortcodes to page.
sections.faq:
How to get Google Client Id?

Please follow the step by step guide [Click here]: https://developers.google.com/identity/gsi/web/guides/get-google-api-clientid
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • Added feature to Create Registration Forms.
  • Added feature to Custom Fields to Registration Forms.
  • Added feature to Create Login Form.
  • Added Google reCaptcha for forms.

1.0.1

  • Security Fixes.

1.0.0

  • Login & Registration Form.
